name: chem_administration
Definition: List of chemical compounds administered to the host or site where sampling occurred, and when (e.g. Antibiotics, n fertilizer, air filter); can include multiple compounds. For chemical entities of biological interest ontology (chebi) (v 163), http://purl.bioontology.org/ontology/chebi
Associated Packages: soil; sediment; pore_water; plant_associated; water; water_extract_biosolid; water_extract_soil; mixed_culture; pure_culture; culture_environmental
explicit_packs: soil; sediment; pore_water; plant_associated; water; water_extract_biosolid; water_extract_soil; mixed_culture; pure_culture; culture_environmental

name: chem_administration

name: isol_growth_condt
Definition: Publication reference in the form of pubmed ID (pmid), digital object identifier (doi) or url for isolation and growth condition specifications of the organism/material. When DOI is not available, provide details in text.
Notes: this is in mixs core, but I'm not sure it should be?

name: size_frac_low
Definition: Refers to the mesh/pore size used to pre-filter/pre-sort the sample. Materials larger than the size threshold are excluded from the sample

name: size_frac_low
Definition: Refers to the mesh/pore size used to pre-filter/pre-sort the sample. Materials larger than the size threshold are excluded from the sample

name: size_frac_up
Definition: Refers to the mesh/pore size used to retain the sample. Materials smaller than the size threshold are excluded from the sample
